DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of predilation with paclitaxel-eluting balloon and bare metal stent implantation VS conventional balloon and drug-eluting stent implantation in terms of restenosis
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Between Paclitaxel-eluting Balloon in Combination With BMS Implantation vs Conventional Balloon and DES Implantation
DOC.criteria: age> 18 years angina or stress test positive for ischemia de novo coronary stenosis>50% recent myocardial infarction (<72h) severe chronic kidney disease allergy to Paclitaxel contraindication for combined antiplatelet treatment life expectancy <1 year hypersensitivity or contraindication to one of the study drugs lack of consent
